!1 Individual Fit Tests

!3 Tests of !-RestFixture.Net-! functionality using the Fit test system

These tests were created during development of !-RestFixture.Net-!, while testing and debugging the 
application.  The tests were created as individual tests, rather than in a test suite, to simplify 
capturing of HTTP requests and responses via a traffic analyser (Wireshark).

Most of these tests have been subsequently incorporated into the Fit Tests suite.
